string.text: Duty Initiation Fee
Colonel Petrenko will let you join Duty for a fee of 12,000 RU.
We would be more than happy to have you join Duty. There is an initiation fee, of course. If you can bring me 12,000 RU I will get you in.
Excellent. Welcome to Duty, stalker. Do us proud.
Intervention
Hostile %s are planning an attack on a Duty camp. Colonel Petrenko has asked you to intercept and eliminate the threat.
I have received intel that a small task force of %s are planning a raid on one of our outposts. If we move quickly we can catch them by surprise before they are able to start their assault.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Reclaim Duty Territory
You have been tasked to recapture territory for Duty. Report back to Colonel Petrenko after the job is done.
I have an important mission available. Freedom has taken over one of our camps and I need a specialist to reclaim it.
You have done well. Good job.
Assassinate VIP for Petrenko
Colonel Petrenko has ordered you to find and eliminate %s known as %s.

I have a list of high-ranking individuals that need to be... taken care of. Some are informants, squad leaders, tacticians, or just plain scum. Extract information if you can, otherwise kill on sight.
Excellent! You do us proud. Here is what I promised.
Expedition Assault
Colonel Petrenko has discovered the location of an enemy camp. Lead the assault party to the target and return them safely when the threat has been eliminated.

We're preparing a raid on a remote enemy encampment of %s. My men are excellent fighters but they couldn't find the tip of their nose even if they were cross eyed. I want you to lead the expedition and guide the men to the target area. Eliminate the enemy presence and return my men safely.
Is that how many men you left with? Ah well, close enough. Excellent work. Here is your reward.
